value = {

components.label: Field of study code

validate.customMessage: The combination of the Credential Type and CIP did not result in a known Field of Study code.

components.label: SABC program code
components.description: Format (XXX#) Mandatory field if using the 'Offerings Upload' feature. Otherwise optional.
components.tooltip: Please see our job aid to choose the appropriate code for your program.

components.label: Program eligibility
components.content: Program eligibility

components.label: Are students able to take this on a part time basis?
components.tooltip: A part-time program has a course load between 20 and 59%. A full-time program must have a course load of: 60% or greater or Between 40 and 60% for students with a permanent disability.

components.label: How will this program be delivered? (Select all that apply)
Will the program also be offered and delivered at 100% course load on site?
Will the students earn the same number of credits in the same time period as students in other StudentAid BC eligible programs delivered on site?
components.customConditional:
const isBCInstitution = data.isBCPublic || data.isBCPrivate;
show = (!isBCInstitution && data.deliveredOnlineAlsoOnsite === "no");

components.label: Will they earn academic credits that are recognized at another designated institution listed in the BC Transfer Guide or other acceptable articulation agreements from other jurisdictions?
components.customConditional:
const isBCInstitution = data.isBCPublic || data.isBCPrivate;
show = (!isBCInstitution && data.deliveredOnlineAlsoOnsite === "no" && data.sameOnlineCreditsEarned ==="no");

components.label: HTML
components.content: This program is ineligible for StudentAid BC funding
components.customConditional:
const isBCInstitution = data.isBCPublic || data.isBCPrivate;
show = (!isBCInstitution && data.deliveredOnlineAlsoOnsite === "no" && data.sameOnlineCreditsEarned === "no" && data.earnAcademicCreditsOtherInstitution === "no");

components.label: Does this program include a minimum of 20 instructional hours per week?
HTML
components.content:
This program is inegligible for StudentAid BC funding
The program needs to be a minimum of 20 instructional hours.

components.label: Does this program include a minimum of 15 instructional hours per week

components.content:
This program is ineligible for StudentAid BC funding

components.label: HTML
components.content:
Which regulatory body does this program belong to?
All programs must be approved by your regulatory body to meet the criteria. If your program has not been approved yet, please contact your regulatory body first.

components.label: Which regulatory body does this program belong to?

values.label: Senate, Academic Council, Education Council, and/or Program Council and Board of Governors

components.label: HTML
components.content: Entrance requirements

components.label: What are the entrance requirements for this program? (Select all that apply)

values.label: Students to have graduated from grade 12 or equivalent.
Students are 19 years old or older before the start of classes.
For post-secondary level academic credit-based programs: This program has entrance requirements established by the institution that enable completion of the program of study.
This program is approved by the SkilledTradesBC and students must meet the entrance requirements set by the B.C. ITA.

components.label: Entrance requirements warning banner
components.content:
This program is ineligible for StudentAid BC funding.
An entrance requirement is required.
